channel.description: Recent content in weka on Mark Needham

item.title: Weka: Saving and loading classifiers
item.description: MultilayerPerceptron classifier = new MultilayerPerceptron(); classifier.buildClassifier(instances); // instances gets passed in from elsewhere Debug.saveToFile("/path/to/weka-neural-network", classifier); SerializedClassifier classifier = new SerializedClassifier(); classifier.setModelFile(new File("/path/to/weka-neural-network"));
